title: What Sound Is This
verses: What sound is this salutes my ear? 'Tis
Gabriel's trump methinks I hear,'Tis Gabriel's trump methinks I hear;
lu-mi-nated by the Lamb, Il-lu-mi-nated by the Lamb,
The expected day has come. Behold the heav'ns,the
In glo-ry doth ap-pear. Fair Zi-on rising

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Anticipates the sound of Gabriel's trumpet and the appearance of New Jerusalem
